TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BYOT extends System.Object

summary.span: 包装 COM+ 类以及 COM+ DTC 接口 和 。

span.span: Wraps the COM+ class and the COM+ DTC interfaces and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks （自带你自己的事务） 允许使用创建或继承的外部事务的组件。 (Bring Your Own Transaction) allows a component to be created with or to inherit an external transaction. 也就是说，尚不包含关联的事务的组件可以获取事务。That is, a component that does not already have an associated transaction can acquire a transaction. COM + 允许将任意预先存在的分布式事务处理协调器 (DTC) 或事务 Internet 协议 (TIP) 事务设置为新组件的上下文的事务属性。COM+ allows setting an arbitrary pre-existing Distributed Transaction Coordinator (DTC) or Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP) transaction as the transaction property of a new component's context. 这将允许 COM + 组件要与由事务处理 (TP) 监视器、 对象/任务选择器 (OTS) 或数据库管理系统 (DBMS) 控制其生存期的事务相关联。This allows COM+ components to be associated with transactions whose lifetimes are controlled by a transaction processing (TP) monitor, Object/Task Selector (OTS), or database management system (DBMS). 事务必须慎重使用。 transactions must be used with caution. 在某些情况下，它们会导致事务跨越多个同步域 — 即，它们允许使用另一个事务，从而导致死锁条件并行。In certain situations, they can result in a transaction spanning multiple synchronization domains—that is, they allow parallelism with another transaction, causing a deadlock condition. 自动事务，而不是事务，是对于业务组件的编写器首选的编程模型。Automatic transactions, rather than transactions, are the preferred programming model for writers of business components.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object CreateWithTipTransaction (string url, Type t);
.method public static hidebysig object CreateWithTipTransaction(string url, class System.Type t) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateWithTipTransaction (url As String, t As Type) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ CreateWithTipTransaction(System::String ^ url, Type ^ t);

span.span: A TIP URL that specifies a transaction.

summary.span: 使用事务 Internet 协议 (TIP) 创建在手动事务内登记的对象。

span.span: Creates an object that is enlisted within a manual transaction using the Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行 COM + DTC 方法的托管等效项`ICreateWithTIPTransaction::CreateInstance`。 performs the managed equivalent of the COM+ DTC method `ICreateWithTIPTransaction::CreateInstance`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object CreateWithTransaction (object transaction, Type t);
.method public static hidebysig object CreateWithTransaction(object transaction, class System.Type t) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateWithTransaction (transaction As Object, t As Type) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ CreateWithTransaction(System::Object ^ transaction, Type ^ t);

param.name: transaction
param.span: 指定事务的 或 对象。

span.span: The or object that specifies a transaction.

summary.span: 创建在手动事务内登记的对象。

span.span: Creates an object that is enlisted within a manual transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行 COM + 分布式事务处理协调器 (DTC) 方法的托管等效项`ICreateWithTransaction::CreateInstance`。 performs the managed equivalent of the COM+ Distributed Transaction Coordinator (DTC) method `ICreateWithTransaction::CreateInstance`.
